channel.title: CVE Feed for Atera -- Atera Agent Package Availability
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atera -- Atera Agent Package Availability

item.title: CVE-2023-37243|2024-09-05T17:45:07.238Z -- atera -- atera%20agent%20package%20availability
item.description: The C:\Windows\Temp\Agent.Package.Availability\Agent.Package.Availability.exe file is automatically launched as SYSTEM when the system reboots. Since the C:\Windows\Temp\Agent.Package.Availability folder inherits permissions from C:\Windows\Temp and Agent.Package.Availability.exe is susceptible to DLL hijacking, standard users can write a malicious DLL to it and elevate their privileges.
